author: Louis Lebaillif
description: Gentian, elderflower and rosemary combine harmoniously, over a Poitín base with aromatised wine.
name: Miss Moonshine
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Lillet Blanc (or other aromatized wine)
10 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
